intro.content:
Welcome BEYONDD Study staff, coordinators, and PI's.

This section encompasses study specific tools and videos for your reference. If you have any questions, comments, or new ideas please contact NCRAD by email or phone (800) 526-2839 or directly at (317) 278-1170.

resources.title: Kit Request Module
resources.content: Please follow the below link to access the BEYONDD Kit Request Module. This link will direct you to a REDCap database where study coordinators and staff may request kits, individual supplies, and/or labels. Please allow up to three weeks for kit requests to be compiled and delivered to your site.
